title: Tied to Hope
description: “Welcome me home…”  My life is what dreams are made of!  I am deeper in love with Thane after the birth of our child, and I can’t believe the plans he has for our future.  My joy Is doubled when Rytsar Durov returns as a conquering hero.  In the midst of such bliss, a dark secret surfaces that has the power to tear our world apart.  Love has always been the cornerstone my journey, and now I must make a heartbreaking choice.  What would you sacrifice for love?
author: Red Phoenix
